description: With the addition of DHCP support to the quantum manager, it calls into self.driver to trigger dnsmask and iptables. This is not needed in a flat network.
title: Quantum network manager assumes non-flat topology

comments.content: With the addition of DHCP support to the quantum manager, it calls into self.driver to trigger dnsmask and iptables. This is not needed in a flat network.
